name: Musicfy
description: An app inspired by Spotify app, it searches for an artists album and articles related to that artist.

name: Password Generator
description: An application that you can use to generate a random password based on criteria selected.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard app that features dynamically updated HTML and CSS.

name: Coding Quiz Challenge
description: A timed coding quiz with multiple-choice questions. This app features dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript code.

name: Team Profile Generator
description: An application that takes in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.

name: Bootstrap Portfolio
description: The layout of my portfolio was recreated and improved using Bootstrap's CSS Framework. The goal was to minimize the use of media queries.
